fields.name: Vythiri Village Resort
fields.description: Vythiri Village is a premium eco-resort nestled in the lush rainforests of Wayanad. Spread across 150 acres of plantation land, it offers luxury cottages with stunning views of the Western Ghats. The resort features an ayurvedic spa, infinity pool, and nature trails through coffee and spice plantations.
fields.short_description: Luxury eco-resort in 150 acres of rainforest with cottages, spa and infinity pool
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in. 50% charge for cancellation within 48 hours.
fields.meta_title: Vythiri Village Resort - Luxury Eco Resort in Wayanad
fields.meta_description: Experience luxury in nature at Vythiri Village, a 5-star eco-resort in Wayanad with cottages, spa, and stunning rainforest views.

fields.name: Wayanad Silverwoods
fields.description: Silverwoods is a boutique resort offering a perfect blend of luxury and nature. Located in Kalpetta, it features elegantly designed rooms with modern amenities, a multi-cuisine restaurant, outdoor pool, and beautiful gardens. The resort is ideal for both leisure and business travelers.
fields.short_description: Boutique resort with elegant rooms, pool, and multi-cuisine dining in Kalpetta
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in. No refund after that.
fields.meta_title: Wayanad Silverwoods - Boutique Resort in Kalpetta
fields.meta_description: Stay at Wayanad Silverwoods, a 4-star boutique resort in Kalpetta with elegant rooms, pool, and excellent dining options.

fields.name: Pepper Trail Resort & Spa
fields.description: Pepper Trail is a luxury wellness resort set amidst spice plantations in Meppadi. The resort offers spacious villas, an ayurvedic spa, yoga pavilion, and organic farm-to-table dining. Perfect for those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation in the lap of nature.
fields.short_description: Luxury wellness resort with villas, ayurvedic spa, and organic dining in spice plantations
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before check-in. 30% charge for 3-7 days, 50% for 48 hours, full charge after that.
fields.meta_title: Pepper Trail Resort & Spa - Luxury Wellness Resort Wayanad
fields.meta_description: Relax at Pepper Trail, a luxury wellness resort in Wayanad with villas, ayurvedic spa, yoga, and organic dining.

fields.name: The Windflower Resort & Spa
fields.description: The Windflower is a family-friendly resort located in the heart of Vythiri. With spacious cottages, kids play area, outdoor activities, and a relaxing spa, it's perfect for family vacations. The resort offers stunning views of the surrounding mountains and valleys.
fields.short_description: Family-friendly resort with cottages, kids activities, spa and mountain views
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in. 25% charge for cancellation within 48 hours.
fields.meta_title: The Windflower Resort & Spa Vythiri - Family Resort Wayanad
fields.meta_description: Family vacation at The Windflower Vythiri with spacious cottages, kids activities, spa, and beautiful mountain views.

fields.name: Wild Planet Resort
fields.description: Wild Planet is an adventure-focused resort offering unique experiences like zip-lining, rock climbing, and wildlife safaris. Located near the forest edge, it features rustic cottages, a campfire area, and guided nature treks. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts and nature lovers.
fields.short_description: Adventure resort with zip-lining, wildlife safaris, and rustic cottages near forest
fields.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before check-in. 50% charge for cancellation within 3 days.
fields.meta_title: Wild Planet Resort Wayanad - Adventure & Wildlife Resort
fields.meta_description: Adventure awaits at Wild Planet Resort with zip-lining, wildlife safaris, trekking, and rustic cottages in Wayanad.
